title: At the Market
description: Nina talks about buying food at the market.
speaker: Nina
text: Today, I want to talk about the market.
I go to the market in the morning.
I buy apples, bananas, and tomatoes.
The food is fresh and good.
At the market, there are many people.
I pay and take my food.
I like going to the market.

questions.q: When does Nina go to the market?
